articles.author: Hayden Field
articles.title: OpenAI CTO Mira Murati announces she's leaving the company - CNBC
articles.description: OpenAI Chief Technology Officer Mira Murati said Wednesday that she is leaving the company after more than six years.
articles.content:
OpenAI Chief Technology Officer Mira Murati said Wednesday that she is leaving the company after six and a half years.
"After much reflection, I have made the difficult decision to leave OpenAI," sh… [+3080 chars]
